summary: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.
cast: Kate Maberly|Heydon Prowse|Andrew Knott|Maggie Smith|Laura Crossley|John Lynch|Walter Sparrow|Irène Jacob|Frank Baker|Valerie Hill|Andrea Pickering|Peter Moreton|Arthur Spreckley|Colin Bruce|Parsan Singh|Eileen Page|David Stoll|Tabatha Allen|Coz Greenop
title: El jardín secreto
